txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Matted skins from the beasts in Ered Luin. Collect them and deliver them to Dorri at Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
'Not as sturdy as hide, but this can be sewn together for patches.\n\n'Your efforts will echo through the halls.'
'Use everything that you can and leave very little for the earth to reclaim. That skin has some use, you see.'
Dorri wants matted skins. Dorri can be found standing at the west gate of Gondamon.
Deliver the matted skins to Dorri at Gondamon
You have accepted a task to acquire matted skins. You are to deliver them to Dorri at the western gate of Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
Wanted: Matted skins from the beasts in Ered Luin.
